name: UpcomingSikhEvents
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: This skill lets Alexa tell you about upcoming Sikh Events happening in your area. This includes Kirtan, Katha, Discussions, Workshops, Camps, Smagams and more. Events can be at Gurdwaras (Sikh places of worship) or any other location. Information is pulled from www.Sikh.Events. Just add this skill to Alexa, and select your feed. Currently Bay Area Sikh Events is the only feed but we will be adding feeds for all supported regions soon. When you ask for your daily briefing, Alexa will tell you about the next 5 upcoming Sikh Events in your area!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
